hostname.description: The hostname or IP address that the listener will bind to

port.description: The port that the listener will bind to

queue_size.description: The size of the queue that the listener will use This is a buffer that will hold flow messages before they are processed by a worker

scheme.description: The scheme defines the type of flow data that the listener will receive The scheme must be one of sflow, netflow, or flow

send_raw.description: SendRaw determines whether to send raw flow messages instead of parsing them

sockets.description: The number of sockets that the listener will use

workers.description: The number of workers that the listener will use to decode incoming flow messages By default it will be two times the number of sockets Ideally set this to the number of CPU cores
